samples.comment: I wanted to ask more specifically if I could use the gear that I own (iPhone and iPad chargers, and MacBook Air M1 laptop with usb-c ports) to charge both Spark Neo and Spark Mini Vai.

Your Devin (ai), feature is not helping, I'm trying to get a human to read my comment so maybe in the future the features I requested will probably be in the new product they are good ideas as I asked to a lot of friend musicians about it and they all agree that it needs a microphone integrated in the system of the headphones and in line out. Hope it helps thank you

What was a seamless operation to upload a song from Spotify and get the chords to play along with has become a near impossible task. I worked at solving the problem for over 4 hours and still cannot get the results I had with Spotify. If I can't get this solved I might just give up on the Spark amp. The main reason I bought the amp was for the interaction with Spotify and the ability to use it to learn and play with songs.
Problem still exists without answers from a real person.

Worst support I have had in a long time. Nothing was resolved by any of the emails. Product cannot sign in. I have sent log files, then received a "fix" that did nothing. You say it is a known issue, but you have not fixed anything. I ask for my money back and you send me this survey. 
I have 15 amp programs on the computer I use, none have any issues. Only yours, it cant sign in. Please send a real fix, or refund my money. This has ruined all respect for positive Grid..
Please prove me wrong.
Not what i want to hera end of case don't bothered me anymore i'm not buying shit from you company anymore
It should have been shipped on the 14th of October but it is still waiting to be collected by the courier.

I’m disappointed that even though I bought a Spark Amp (original order number provided),  I can’t get the upgrade discount because I sold it the day before with the intentions of upgrading.   I tried to register it but either the new owner already did or I did it some time back and used a different email address that I don’t have access to.  
I’m now evaluating what I want to replace it with.  It was going to be the Spark 2, but I’m now reconsidering.  Giving me the discount price would help me make that decision.

I reached out to your support with a request for a custom bundle pricing for 4 products worth of well over $1000 during time which you did not have any sales. While waiting for your reply, bunch of items went for sale which were not exactly what I needed, but I could satisfy my needs if I bought even more items. The reply finally came after 5 days, practically saying we won't do custom bundles but here is $20 off (appx 1% off the goods I wanted to buy). Well I thought ok, I will purchase the goods via the sales. But I lost my opportunity by one day while waiting for your reply. In other words the sales were gone. Additionally one of the products I wanted to order the price went up by $50. So I reached out to you back and said, I missed the sale by one day because it took so long for you to reply my original request, can you honor the one day old sale price and I will actually end up ordering more products. The answer was no but I can still give you $20 off. Thanks

Your last email really brought fire into me!

Are you kidding me??!!
After my complaint is legit (I'm not going to waste more time to name all the reasons, there are MANY and OBVIOUS!) additionally the plugin is useless, dead, with never any updates PLUS wasting $140 , do you really want to add insult to injury by asking me to purchase more trash from your company?

The least you could of done is offer the 'upgrade' for free!!! The very very least!

BS capitalist scheming doesn't work here buddy!

And I am 1000% right and anybody with any kind of brain would notice that your company is corrupt and would go down the drain with the kind of products and policies you put out.

I appreciated the quick responses, both from the AI agents and your staff but the resolution to this problem was unsatisfactory for me and I have had to return the product due to a fairly short-sighted and unadvertised decision to include a 15 minute power-off feature - something that was not advertised and is not present on your competitors products and which makes it unsuitable for live use (especially in my church music setting).

I have provided quite a lot of feedback which I hope goes into your planning, should you re-issue or create a new version, however there was no suggestion of how Positive Grid might try to retain my brand loyalty (which was fairly high as I love my Spark Go and admire many of your other products).

I have since had to purchase a more expensive Boss equivalent (that has a far more reasonable 1 hour timeout), which is more practical for my usage but lacks some of the finesse that I admired. Although I appreciate that changing these things is difficult, I was still surprised by the lack of commitment that was shown to trying to fix things - for example even being asked if I might be interested in testing any potential new versions in the future.
AI had me going in circles and never helped at all.
It was AI and totally did not resolve my issue and there is no clear way to move to the next step to get it resolved

Spark AI stopped working. I tried various things before contacting you including looking at your support pages which were of no help. You could have troubleshooting information for this problem. I'm still not sure the problem was at my end. You make it sound like it couldn't possibly be a fault at your end.

In response to the aspect of not being able to find the serial number, the reply from your AI support said I should do what I had already explained is impossible which is to pull back the cover on the Spark Go. If it has a cover and I don't think it has, it is so thick Popeye wouldn't be able to shift it and I'm not going to force it and risk damaging it just because you won't listen. What do you make hard to find it for in the first place? I connect to my phone in the app so why don't you include the serial number there? I'm logged in. Surely it can't be hard to link my account and serial number. It is a perennial problem that companies create problems and then pretend they haven't by saying 'do this' as if that is accurate and easy which it rarely is. I was going to give this feedback in response until I saw it says 'Devin' is not a real person. It's good that you make clear you are using AI support but it stifles feedback and dialogue.
I‘d appreciate a personal message from the  Team regarding my issue and not an AI generated message. Unfortunately the info I got was not satisfying as it did not cointained much new info.

The response "came from" AI and was totally wrong the first time. I did try again and I did get a response, but cannot trust it as I believe it is just picking info from your website which I can read myself.

It’s almost impossible to get the right answers from an AI bot. It’s absolutely necessary to speak to a human being to relay the information necessary to get my amp repaired. At this point the only solution is to buy a new one and they didn’t even give me a price to exchange my old amp. 
I’m thinking that I have to go with another company because I’m a performer and need my gear ASAP . It all needs to be reprogrammed and test before I start in front of an audience.
Using an Ai bot to reply to questions is bullshit.  The answer was bullshit and you put people out of work. Fuck you for doing that. It honestly Makes me regret buying your product

The initial support with AI was helpful although it could not solve the issue. The interaction with the staff members was frustrating, where two members of staff were not communicating clear with each other. This resulted in me going through the same procedure again to try and resolve the issue. I had a sense that they thought I did not know what I was doing hence the repeating of steps and videos.

the instructions I received via email was NOT correct / detailed enough. I followed the email instructions - entered my email address: then entered the password provided: after doing so I was unable to change my password. I logged out, went back to the email, re-read the email; followed instructions AGAIN. I found that after I logged in I was NOT able to change password. I then logged out AGAIN, went back to your website, entered my email address ( I did NOT enter the password provided ), then clicked on forgot password. Your website then sent me a link to change my password - that worked PERFECTLY.

allComments.comment: there is always an answer but no solution!!!
Not too bad tho just took a long time to figure out the exact problem
I wanted to ask more specifically if I could use the gear that I own (iPhone and iPad chargers, and MacBook Air M1 laptop with usb-c ports) to charge both Spark Neo and Spark Mini Vai.
I purchased an Elite license for BIAS FX 2 and assumed it would extend to using on an iPad, which it didn’t. It was suggested I purchase this too which I will not be doing
I have not received any support yet. You should not submit a survey before providing support, this can only give you bad ratings.
I have not received any support yet.

Please prove me wrong.

I purchase and a week later, it goes on sale. I think I deserve the sale price.
GD
Response:       Hello Gregory,

Thank you for reaching out regarding the recent price change on the Spark GO. I understand your concern about the price adjustment happening so soon after your purchase yesterday.

Currently, we don't have a policy in place for price adjustments or matching for recent orders when promotions occur. Because of this, we are unable to offer a refund for the price difference between your purchase price and the current sale price.

There’s a bug and it’s still there.

Spark AI stopped working. I tried various things before contacting you including looking at your support pages which were of no help. You could have troubleshooting information for this problem. I'm still not sure the problem was at my end. You make it sound like it couldn't possibly be a fault at your end.

In response to the aspect of not being able to find the serial number, the reply from your AI support said I should do what I had already explained is impossible which is to pull back the cover on the Spark Go. If it has a cover and I don't think it has, it is so thick Popeye wouldn't be able to shift it and I'm not going to force it and risk damaging it just because you won't listen. What do you make hard to find it for in the first place? I connect to my phone in the app so why don't you include the serial number there? I'm logged in. Surely it can't be hard to link my account and serial number. It is a perennial problem that companies create problems and then pretend they haven't by saying 'do this' as if that is accurate and easy which it rarely is. I was going to give this feedback in response until I saw it says 'Devin' is not a real person. It's good that you make clear you are using AI support but it stifles feedback and dialogue.

In researching this matter, it appears that there have been many requests about the use of the Spark with this Looper yet no one from Positive Grid has reached out to see if there can be a resolution. Like a file update? etc. The response from PG seems to be its not our problem, which is true I guess but wondering why PG hasn't considered being part of the solution either?
I‘d appreciate a personal message from the  Team regarding my issue and not an AI generated message. Unfortunately the info I got was not satisfying as it did not cointained much new info.
Whilst the advice recovered all the built-in presets, I lost all my user created tones.

I have a Spark 40 that quit working, was offered a discount to replace it and opted for that.  All good.  Then I was told I would receive reimbursement for shipping initially then later told I would not receive reimbursement for shipping. NOT GOOD!  I spent $150 dollars on the toatl transaction - for the dollars I would have been better off buying a new Spark 50.  I asked for this and was denied...  Very irritated,
